results.title: Metformin inhibits early stage diethylnitrosamine-induced hepatocarcinogenesis in rats
results.text_hl: Therefore, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may be used for the prevention of @DISEASE_Carcinoma_Hepatocellular @DISEASE_MESH:D006528 @@@HCC@@@ recurrence following primary chemotherapy for @DISEASE_Carcinoma_Hepatocellular @DISEASE_MESH:D006528 @@@HCC@@@ and/or for high-risk @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, including @<m>DISEASE_Hepatitis_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006521 @@@chronic hepatitis@@@ and @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@cirrhosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Jo W, Yu ES, Chang M, Park HK, Choi HJ, Ryu JE, Jang S, Lee HJ, Jang JJ, Son WC. Metformin inhibits early stage diethylnitrosamine-induced hepatocarcinogenesis in rats Mol Med Rep. 2016 Jan;13(1):146-52. PMID: 26548419
